snippet: From basketball innovator to coaching flameout, Mike D’Antoni has survived the roller coaster of the NBA and landed back in the league’s good graces....

headline.main: Congo Opposition Party Expels Top Official in Sign of Infighting
headline.print_headline: Congo Opposition Party Expels Top Official in Sign of Infighting

lead_paragraph: From basketball innovator to coaching flameout, Mike D’Antoni has survived the roller coaster of the NBA and landed back in the league’s good graces.
